        <script><![CDATA[var BuilderToolkitAPIGlobal = Class.create();
BuilderToolkitAPIGlobal.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    _getQuery: function(genericGR, encodedQuery, orderBy, noDomain) {
        genericGR.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery);
        if (orderBy) {
            genericGR.orderBy(orderBy);
        }
        genericGR[noDomain ? 'queryNoDomain' : 'query']();
        return genericGR;
    },
    get: function(table, encodedQuery, orderBy, noDomain) {
        var genericGR = new GlideRecord(table);
        return this._getQuery(genericGR, encodedQuery, orderBy, noDomain);
    },
    getSecure: function(table, encodedQuery, orderBy, noDomain) {
        var genericGR = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
        return this._getQuery(genericGR, encodedQuery, orderBy, noDomain);
    },
    getUserUpdateSetId: function() {
        return new GlideUpdateSet().get();
    },
    setUserUpdateSetId: function(sysId) {
        var gus = new GlideUpdateSet();
        sysId ? gus.set(sysId) : gus.set(gus.getDefault());
    },
	createGlobalRecord: function(tableName, fields){
		var newGr = new GlideRecordSecure(tableName);
		newGr.initialize();
		for(var field in fields){
			newGr.setValue(field, fields[field]);
		}
		return newGr.insert();
	},
	deleteGlobalRecord: function(tableName, sysId){
		var record = new GlideRecordSecure(tableName);
		if(record.get(sysId)){
			return record.deleteRecord();
		}
	},
	evaluateScript: function(scriptString){
		var ge = new GlideEvaluator();
		return ge.interpretGeneratedString(scriptString);
	},
    type: 'BuilderToolkitAPIGlobal'
};]]></script>
